SEARCH
Package pointOfSales.entities

Class orderProduct

java.lang.Object
pointOfSales.entities.orderProduct
public class orderProduct extends Object
Represents an item in an order with details about product, quantity, and customizations.

  • Constructor Details

    • orderProduct

      public orderProduct(String PID, int ProductQuantity, ArrayList<String> ToppingList, double Sugar, String ice, String NoteInput)
      Constructs an orderProduct object with all customizations.
      Parameters:
      PID - Product ID as a string.
      ProductQuantity - Quantity of product ordered.
      ToppingList - List of toppings.
      Sugar - Sugar percentage.
      ice - Ice level.
      NoteInput - Special notes or instructions.

    • orderProduct

      Parameters:
      PID - Product ID as a string.
      ProductQuantity - Quantity of product ordered.
      Sugar - Sugar percentage.
      ice - Ice level.
      NoteInput - Special notes or instructions.

      Retrieves a list of order products associated with a given order ID.

      order_id - Order ID.
